item.title: Long Term Power Outage
item.description: Using a Raspberry Pi as a DNS server is not a good idea. Most computers have an internal clock, or a "Real Time Clock". Pi's don't. So, say a natural disaster leads to an extended power outage, the iternal clock will be off and that can cause some fun DNS issues.
